alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 30 at 3:28AM PST until November 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 10 to 20 inches through this evening. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph this morning. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Snow level will be around 2000 feet today, lowering to 1000 feet tonight. Snow showers will bring additional accumulations tonight and Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
